Authors:
Sadiq Ullah, MEHARDAD Abbasi, Mary Catherine Aime, AAMNA
ISHAQ, Muhammad Fiaz, Abdul Nasir Khalid
Title: Allodus prostii comb. nov., causal agent of tulip rust
Keywords:
autoecious rust fungi, fungal taxonomy, Pucciniales, rDNA
sequences, Shangla, Uredinales
Abstract:
Molecular study on Puccinia prostii infecting Tulipa
clusiana revealed the species is phylogenetically and morphologically
congeneric with Allodus. On the basis of these results the new
combination, Allodus prostii is proposed and the species is fully
described and illustrated. We also redefine here the genus Allodus based
on molecular and morphological results.
